question: (Jimmy of the Clue Crew reports from the Dance Theatre of Harlem in New York.)  In 2009, the Dance Theatre of Harlem celebrated its 40th anniversary; Arthur Mitchell cofounded it in response to this April 1968 tragedy
answer: the assassination of Martin Luther King
